name: Dreamboat (itch)
description:
This game requires a VR device (Oculus Quest 1 or Quest 2) to be played 

A whimsical, calming little VR adventure set in a world between dreams, helping a concerned sea squirrel on a search for her triplets. Listen closely... and you may just be guided toward them

A project by Dream Team for Women's Game Jam 2021 with the theme Sailing in Unknown Waters

Dream Team is an Australian four member team of participants consisting of:

  • Amanda Parks | Programming & Tech Art
  • Jane Wei | Music, Sound Design & Voice Acting
  • Samantha Handley | 3D Art, 2D Art & Character Design
  • Harley Brown | Narrative Design, Script Writing, Voice Acting & 2D Art

How To Play
Left Thumbstick : Move Boat
Right Thumbstick : Snap Turn
A Button : Interact
